# penUpperSide

**Type Property**

A mask that matches the button on the upper side of the device.

## Declaration

```swift
static var penUpperSide: NSEvent.ButtonMask { get }
```

## Getting the Tablet Button Masks

- **penTip**: A mask that matches the pen tip.
- **penLowerSide**: A mask that matches the button on the lower side of the device.
